name: Wall of Faith
text:
Flying
When Wall of Faith enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
If a Mountain is tapped for mana, it produces {C} instead of any other type.

name: Zhalfirin Guardian
text: Whenever Zhalfirin Guardian becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

name: Scattering Wizard
text: {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
